title: A speeding clock could solve Darwin's mystery of gaps in animal fossil records - Phys.org

title: 'Trump's EPA' in 2025: A fossil fuel-friendly approach to deregulation
description: The administration says its actions will "unleash" the American economy, but environmentalists say the agency's abrupt change in focus threatens to unravel years of progress on climate-friendly initiatives.
